alert.note: Alert for Pike (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 02 at 9:22PM CDT until further notice by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following river in Missouri...Illinois... Mississippi River at Clarksville. Mississippi River at Louisiana. River forecasts are based on observed precipitation and forecast precipitation for the next 24 hours. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Mississippi River at Clarksville. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 25.5 feet, State Route P east of Elsberry begins flooding just east of the levee. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 PM CDT Monday the stage was 24.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Wednesday morning and continue rising to a crest of 26.1 feet early Thursday afternoon. - Flood stage is 25.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg 7 pm Tue Wed Thu Fri Sat Mississippi River Clarksville 25.0 24.8 24.6 25.6 26.1 25.9 25.6 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. This product, along with additional weather and stream information, is available at https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=lsx.
